translation.welcome-new: Welcome to dice championship! <audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/ui/gameshow/amzn_ui_sfx_gameshow_intro_01'/> Let's see how high you can score by rolling ten dice.
translation.result-lowerScore: Looks like you remain the <say-as interpret-as='ordinal'>{{rank}}</say-as> place for now.
translation.result-newPersonalHighscore: Congrats, that's a new personal highscore! <audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/ui/gameshow/amzn_ui_sfx_gameshow_positive_response_01'/>
translation.result-higherRank: Congrats, this new personal highscore earns you the <say-as interpret-as='ordinal'>{{rank}}</say-as> place in the leaderboard! <audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/ui/gameshow/amzn_ui_sfx_gameshow_positive_response_02'/>
translation.result-numberOneRank: Congrats, that's the best score so far! <audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/ui/gameshow/amzn_ui_sfx_gameshow_positive_response_03'/>
translation.prompt-short: Do you want to try again?
translation.prompt-full: Do you want to throw the dice now?
translation.help-launch: Dice Championship lets you roll 10 dice, and compare your score with players from around the world.<audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/ui/gameshow/amzn_ui_sfx_gameshow_intro_01'/>
translation.help-rank: You are currently the <say-as interpret-as='ordinal'>{{rank}}</say-as> place in the leaderboard, with a personal highscore of <say-as interpret-as='cardinal'>{{score}}</say-as> points. <audio src='soundbank://soundlibrary/ui/gameshow/amzn_ui_sfx_gameshow_bridge_01'/>
